text: (yada karo) jyare ke tamari bahena cali rahi hati ane kaheti hati ke jo tame kaho to hum tene janavi da'um, je teni dekharekha rakhe, a upayathi ame tamane phari tamari mata pase pahoncadya jethi teni ankho thandi rahe ane te nirasa na thaya ane tame eka vyaktine mari nankhyo hato, tenathi pana ame tamane nirasa thavathi bacavi lidha, chevate ame tamari kasoti khuba sari rite kari lidhi, pachi tame ketalaya varsa sudhi “madayana” saherana loko sathe rahya, pachi allahani iccha pramane he musa! Tame avya
